title: Hi the boards keep saying i need to be lvl 7 to post
body: ...but I'm already lvl 9 and i still can't post anywhere else??

replies.body: Sometimes it takes a bit for your boards account to correctly sync up with your Summoner level. Posting here in H&S or using the Syncing Tool up top will do the trick! You should be able to freely post anywhere now ^_^
